Resume

Hello!

Greetings, fellow traveler of the binary realm! I am your droid guide, a Jedi of robotics and AI on a mission to engineer the future. From crafting autonomous companions to co-piloting open-source ADAS adventures, my circuits pulse with the Force of innovation. Join me in a galaxy of projects and discoveries, where cutting-edge tech meets the magic of AI. The journey to the stars begins here. May the force be with you.
